data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Nyeri, Kenya to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nyeri, Kenya
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Nyeri, Kenya, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Father, help the 344,055 believers in Nyeri to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Jesus, your return is closer than when we first believed. Please, set urgency in the hearts of the people living in the state of Nyeri.
data.verse: Besides this you know the time, that the hour has come for you to wake from sleep. For salvation is nearer to us now than when we first believed.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Sindhi people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Nyeri, Kenya will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 344,055 believers living in Nyeri, Kenya.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 693,600 souls living in the state of Nyeri with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

location.name: Nyeri
location.people_groups_list: Kachchi, Punjabi, Gujarati Creole, Gujarati, Somali Ajuran
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Kachchi (80,000), Punjabi (67,000), Gujarati Creole (2,100), Gujarati (212,000), Somali Ajuran (232,000)
